pullrequest.title: Add startup script for handsim with APL arm

content.raw: In retrospect, part of the idea was to support multiple arm models without duplicating the definition of the arat world and all the tasks and model locations. You could use a single world model and then dynamically spawn whichever arm you want into the world (similar to drcsim where you can spawn different atlas models into a single world without needing to duplicate the world definition). This script may be reconsidered if support for multiple arm models is desired without duplicating code.
content.html: In retrospect, part of the idea was to support multiple arm models without duplicating the definition of the arat world and all the tasks and model locations. You could use a single world model and then dynamically spawn whichever arm you want into the world (similar to drcsim where you can spawn different atlas models into a single world without needing to duplicate the world definition). This script may be reconsidered if support for multiple arm models is desired without duplicating code.
